PlateCustomize.Title: Plate Customization, Ye Scallywag
PlateCustomize.Description: Enter yer desired plate text, matey

Checks.NoInput: No plate text be submitted, arrr
Checks.NotLongEnough: Yer plate text be too short, ye landlubber
Checks.TooLong: Yer plate text be too long fer the ship
Checks.MustBeNetworked: This vessel must be networked, savvy?
Checks.NoVehicle: No ship be close enough to plunder
Checks.LetterNumber: Must be letters or numbers only, no funny business
Checks.PlateTaken: Another vessel already flies this flag
Checks.NotVehicleOwner: Ye don't be ownin' the vessel with plate %s
Checks.BadWord: Ye can't be usin' such foul language, even fer a pirate
Checks.InsideVehicle: Ye must be outside yer vessel to do this

Success.PlateSet: Ship's flag be updated from %s to %s, arrr!
